divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the balcony of an apt. In the city of Birmingham,AL, when I happened to glance over my shoulder and saw what appeared to be a bright orange odd shape hovering over in the sky, it was moving in a path but barely. It was shortly before awaiting fireworks to go off, close to 9:30ish. I looked again confirming that what I was seeing was in fact real and not just meharding things, I kept a close eye on it on and off. Then one of the times I looked away and when I looked back it completely was gone as if it vanished into thin air. I have no idea what it was, but have definitely seen nothing Ike it. If anyone has witnessed the same, please post. I'd love to find out.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There was one other sighting in Birmingham on or around July 4th 2012
Summary: Bright orange odd shape glow light hovering in sky, AL
